pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fasano-Franceschini Test: A Multivariate Kolmogorov-Smirnov Two- Sample Test // An implementation of the two-sample multivariate Kolmogorov-Smirnov test described by Fasano and Franceschini (1987) doi:10.1093/mnras/225.1.155. This test evaluates the null hypothesis that two i.i.d. random samples were drawn from the same underlying probability distribution. The data can be of any dimension, and can be of any type (continuous, discrete, or mixed).
